description: This file defines classes for reading CSV files both synchronously and asynchronously, including support for reading from URLs. It includes the CSVReader class for local file reading and the CSVUrlReader class for URL-based CSV fetching, with methods for batch processing and chunking.

classes.name: CSVReader
classes.description: A class for reading CSV files synchronously and asynchronously, converting rows into Document objects, with support for chunking.

classes.name: CSVUrlReader
classes.description: A class for fetching CSV files from URLs and reading them using CSVReader, supporting both sync and async operations.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads a CSV file from a local path or file-like object synchronously, returning a list of Document objects.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronously reads a CSV file from a local path or file-like object, processing in pages, returning a list of Document objects.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Fetches a CSV file from a URL and reads it synchronously using CSVReader.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Fetches a CSV file from a URL asynchronously and reads it using CSVReader's async method.
